import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import CategoryButton from './CategoryButton'; const AddOrder = ({ table, categories, handleGoBack }) => { const [categoryClicked, isCategoryClicked] = useState(false); const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { console.log(table); }, [table]); const handleCategory = (name) => { setSelectedCategory(name); }; const handleChange = () => {}; return (
Table: {table.number}
Products QTY Total
{table.order.products.map((product, i) => ( {product}
))} {table.order.quantities.map((quantity, i) => ( {quantity}
))} {table.order.prices.map((price, i) => ( {price} €
))}
{categories.map((category, i) => selectedCategory === category.Category ? (
handleChange(category.name, category.price)} > {category.name} {category.price} €
) : null )}
); }; export default AddOrder;
